### News
#### Next meetup on Wednesday, August 3, 2016
The next meetup will be a [visualisation spezial](http://www.meetup.com/Zurich-R-User-Group/events/231840730/).

- You are interested in seeing and learning about some neat visualisations in R? 
[RSVP on the meetup site](http://www.meetup.com/Zurich-R-User-Group/events/231840730/) and come by!
- You have any interesting visualisations you would like to show in a 5-8 minute presentation? 
[Contact us](http://www.meetup.com/Zurich-R-User-Group/members/?op=leaders)!
- You know a great location in Zurich where we could hold the meetup? 
[Contact us](http://www.meetup.com/Zurich-R-User-Group/members/?op=leaders)!
